details:
vduse: check that offset is within bounds in get_config()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit ebbbc5fea3f648175df1aa3f127c78eb0252cc2a, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit c8a6153b6c59d95c0e091f053f6f180952ade91e. For more details please see the references link.
summary: vduse: check that offset is within bounds in get_config()
